mapper.select: SELECT dd.`device_id`,dd.`device_type`,dd.`produce_company`,dd.`produce_time`,ci1.`company_tel` AS `produce_company_tel`,dd.`purchase_company`,dd.`purchase_time`,ci2.`company_tel` AS `purchase_company_tel` FROM device_details dd LEFT JOIN `company_information` ci1 ON dd.`produce_company` = ci1.`company_name` LEFT JOIN `company_information` ci2 ON dd.`purchase_company` = ci2.`company_name` WHERE device_id = #{deviceId}
